Package GOFO.DataModel

Class DataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • GOFO.DataModel.DataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    I_LogIn
    public class DataSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements I_LogIn
    class is singleton class which means it has only one object this class is responsible for storing all the data about the player or the play ground owner and the admin it will all the methods needed to get the data needed for the application there will be in there some hard coded player and playGrounds for testing this data will not be connect to any databases maybe it will be stored in text file but that is not for sure yet
    Author:
    mohamed * @version v1.0
